title:
On May 28th, I submitted a question to the Star News, WWAY, and WECT, but apparently my question was too specific and businesses still are afraid of  going up against long-time big-land owners, so I will re-phrase more generically:



To whom do I file a complaint when a neighbor uses their private property in an old developed County neighborhood for condemned housing debris and illegal dumping?  I would very much like this property cleaned up; it is a public nuisance.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18
